ComicInfo.Summary:
Celebrate the 15th anniversary of the bloody tale about the slasher victim who fought back with these brand-new stories from HACK/SLASH alumni STEFANO CASELLI, EMILY STONE, and DAN LEISTER, as well as new, emerging talent! Plus: an unmissable lead story from—and about!—disgruntled comics writer TIM SEELEY, who makes a wish for Cassie Hack to become real… and then becomes a victim himself when his creation swears to kill him.
*Contents* Your Darlings Kill You Abyss System Ready Random Facts Timeline Shit My Vlad Says Pin-Up: Jay A. Defoy & Carlos Badilla Pin-Up: Brian Crowley & Wesley Wong Pin-Up: Brent Schoonover Pin-Up: Emily Stone Pin-Up: Tim Seeley & Andrew Dalhouse Pin-Up: Darick Maasen Pin-Up: Tim Seeley & Mark Englert Pin-Up: Tim Seeley Pin-Up: Stefano Caselli *List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-----------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Tyler Walpole | 1 | | B | Cover B | Tim Seeley & Carlos Badilla | 2 |
